charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1101_0100:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was exploring
some caves one day, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] ran into Roark.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1101_0200:
His eyebrows furrowed in concentration
as he gazed deep into the cave...
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_0300:
I was just trying to imagine how I would
have dug out this area if it were me.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_0401_0500:
Well, I like drawing up plans and blueprints
in my head for digging up caves and things.
It’s fun!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_0402_0700:
Well, I like drawing up plans and blueprints
in my head for digging up caves and things.
It’s fun!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_0800:
I wonder what the person who built this
artificial island was thinking when
they dug out these caves.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_0900:
If it were me, I think I would have turned
these caves into a giant tunnel system that
could transport people all over the island.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_0401_1100:
Hehe, thanks. But if a tunnel’s gonna be
used by that many people, the builders
have to make sure it’s completely safe.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_0402_1300:
Of course, if a tunnel’s gonna be
used by that many people, the builders
have to make sure it’s completely safe.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_1400:
Someday, I’d love to excavate and build
something like that! The biggest, greatest
tunnel in the whole world!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_1500:
Imagine how much happiness a tunnel
like that could bring to people!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_1600:
Plus, if I’m excavating that much ground,
I’m bound to find all sorts of cool, rare fossils
along the way!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_1700:
Fossil collecting is my life’s work, you know!
Digging up enough of them to open my own
museum has always been a dream of mine.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_1800:
Ideally, I’d build a whole underground city
and open up the museum there! Sounds like
something out of an epic movie, right?
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_1900:
I’d have tons of ultra-rare fossils on display—
ones you can’t find anywhere else!
I’m sure it would be fun for visitors...
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_2000:
but it’s just a silly dream, after all.
I’m sure it’ll never happen. 
You probably think I’m crazy, don’t you?
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_0301_2100: I bet you could do it, Roark!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_0401_2200:
You really think so?
Thanks...for supporting my dream.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_0302_2300: No! I’d love to visit your museum!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_0402_2400: Really? Thanks...for believing in my dream.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_2500:
Honestly, I’ve been thinking of giving up
on that dream again lately.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_2600:
But hearing you say that just now gave me
courage. I think I want to keep chasing
my dream, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_0301_2700:
“Again”? You’ve given up 
on your dream before?
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_0401_2800:
It was a long time ago, but yes.
I had just finished building my first tunnel
ever...and the very next day, it collapsed.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_0402_3000:
Well, I almost gave it up once, a long time ago.
I had just finished building my first tunnel
ever...and the very next day, it collapsed.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_3100:
I was in shock... I’d reviewed my blueprints
over and over and built the tunnel to the best 
of my ability. I was confident it was safe!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_3200:
But I failed. The fact that the tunnel collapsed
despite how hard I’d worked felt like a sign
that maybe digging wasn’t for me after all.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_3300:
I kept dwelling on those thoughts,
and I came really close to giving up...
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_3400:
but then I saw my buddy here smash open
a rock that was said to be unbreakable!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_3500:
Cranidos picked up a rock and body-slammed
the supposedly unbreakable rock with it,
and it smashed right open!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_3600:
I had never thought to do that before.
That day, Cranidos taught me that there’s
never just one way to do things.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_3700:
It seems like both you and Cranidos taught me
another lesson today.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_3800:
No matter how crazy and outlandish my dream
may seem, as long as I never give up, I may
think of a way to make it a reality someday!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_3900:
I’ll have to learn how to think outside
the box and become more resourceful,
just like my partner here!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_4000:
I’ll still be Roark the Rock!
My willpower will still be unbreakable!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_4100:
I just need to break out of my box
and think more unconventionally!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_1201_0100:
Ah, hello Roark! I came here for fossil excavation,
but I’ve been rather unlucky so far...
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_1201_0200:
Yeah, that’s understandable. This site was made
just like an authentic dig site, after all! The trick is
to not give up and just keep digging.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_1201_0300:
All of the fossils you can find here had originally
been hiding in the earth for tens of thousands
of years before they were brought to Pasio.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_1201_0400:
Maybe they’re trying not to be found a
second time...
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_1201_0500:
You say that...but it seems like your Cranidos has
found a lot of fossils.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_1201_0600:
Well, he does always dig with me, whether it’s
in a mine or a fossil dig site.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_1201_0700:
Thanks to that, he’s gotten pretty tough!
How about if we take a little break and have us
a Pokémon battle?
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_0101_0100:
I accept your challenge! I may not have had luck
with the fossils, but I won’t need luck in a
Pokémon battle!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_0101_0200:
All right! You’ll see how strong digging every day
has made us!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_0501_0200:
But such power... Your attacks would probably
allow you to pulverize an entire mineshaft on
your own!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_0501_0300:
You guys were really tough! There were a few
moments where I thought we might not be able to
break through your defense!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_0501_0400:
Hm? What’s up Cranidos? Wait, was that battle
enough to make you evolve?!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_0501_0500:
Thanks, Roxanne! Cranidos was able to get even
stronger, thanks to you!
